comment: If a class belongs to a function on a singleton, then that class is the obvious ordered pair. Note that this theorem also holds when ` A ` is a proper class, but its meaning is then different. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2016.)
